props.prop: SELECT IDVARIATIONPOINT, SUM(LINES_ADDED),SUM(LINES_DELETED) FROM VARIATION_POINT VP NATURAL JOIN CUSTOMIZATION_FACT WHERE ID_FEATURE_GROUP!=0 GROUP BY IDVARIATIONPOINT

SELECT IDVARIATIONPOINT,SUM(LINES_ADDED),SUM(LINES_DELETED), IDCOREASSET, NAME FROM VARIATION_POINT VP NATURAL JOIN CUSTOMIZATION_FACT INNER JOIN core_asset ON ID_COREASSET=IDCOREASSET GROUP BY IDVARIATIONPOINT

SELECT IDVARIATIONPOINT,SUM(LINES_ADDED),SUM(LINES_DELETED), IDCOREASSET, NAME FROM FEATURES_IN_VARIATIONPOINTS INNER JOIN CUSTOMIZATION_FACT ON ID_VARIATIONPOINT=IDVARIATIONPOINT INNER JOIN core_asset ON ID_COREASSET=IDCOREASSET WHERE LOWER(FEATURE_NAME)=? GROUP BY IDVARIATIONPOINT;
